document_data.name: Uther
document_data.mainbody:
{{Otheruses4|the dye|the individual from [[Suzail]]|Uther (individual)}}
'''Uther''' was a dye found in the city of [[Qadib]] in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Uses: The city of Qadib was well known for its dyemakers. Uther was a crimson yellow-orange dye used in coloring many fabrics, including [[Wikipedia:felt|felt]]. The merchants of Qadib exported Uther throughout Zakhara.
document_data.History: Around [[1367 DR]],{{AQ-time}} many of the citizens throughout the City of Wands were identified by the uther colored clothing, such as their gold-colored [[robe]]s or yellow [[fez]]zes.
